title: Sovereign AGI Integrity Halt Log (High Assurance)
description: Schema for logging catastrophic integrity failure events, complying with TVCR and CRoT mandates.

IH_Timestamp.description: Time of detected Integrity Halt (UTC, ISO 8601 strict).

IH_Identifier.description: Unique UUID assigned to this specific Halt event instance for tracking.

GSEP_C_Stage.description: The GSEP-C stage during which the halt was triggered. Expanded stage list for granularity.

Halt_Code.description: Standardized alpha-numeric error code for programmatic analysis (e.g., IH-101).

Halt_Reason.description: Descriptive, categorical failure summary (e.g., LGC Mismatch, Unauthorized Mutex Access).

Halt_Context.description: Contextual information relating the halt to the trust mandate.

CRoT_ID.description: Unique identifier for the CRoT instance that enforced the halt.

Checklist_Ref.description: Reference ID from the CRoT Enforcement Manifest (e.g., 2.1, 4.1.1).

State_Vector_Hash.description: SHA-512 hash of the failed system state vector, recorded prior to shutdown.

CSK_Verification_Signature.description: Cryptographic signature of the entire log entry generated by the PSM using the Core Security Key (CSK). Expected to be Base64Url encoded.
